title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 11.1 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 11.1 - Definition

State Regulations

The term local health officer shall mean: (a) a commissioner of health as defined in section
11.10
of this Part; (b) a public health director as defined in section
11.181
of this Part; (c) the health director of a county, appointed pursuant to and subject to the provisions of section
356
of the Public Health Law; or
(d) the officer of a city having a population of less than 50,000, town, village or consolidated health district who administers and manages public health programs within such jurisdiction and who has the general powers and duties specified in the Public Health Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
11.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
